resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
We have added accessibilityLabel to UI Label or UI PickerView to locate these elements in Automation Testing. After adding accessibilityLabel can't read label text or picker row title. Instead of text and title accessibilityLabel is showing in Appium studio. Please refer attached screenshot. Is it expected behaviour? Do we have any alternate to overcome this issue.

Note: Setting accessibilityLabel to text input is working fine.
fields.summary: Unexpected text and title in Appium Studio after setting accessibilityLabel to Label and PickerRow

comments.body: Thanks. I will update the customer asap.
